text: John Richard Green (born 7 March 1958) is a former footballer who scored 17 goals from 478 appearances in the Football League playing as a centre back for Rotherham United (two spells), Scunthorpe United and Darlington in the 1970s and 1980s. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Rotherham Category:English footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Rotherham United F.C. players Category:Scunthorpe United F.C. players Category:Darlington F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: John Green (footballer, born 1958)
